description:
Kaneda is a carefree gang-leader who boasts a custom-modified motorcycle. He and http://anidb.net/ch7560 [Tetsuo] have been best friends since early childhood. He is brash and not above teasing Tetsuo despite feeling affection for him as a younger brother. Upon rescuing http://anidb.net/ch9255 [Kei], Kaneda becomes involved in the activities of her group of anti-government guerrillas in hopes of locating Tetsuo.
Source: wikipedia.org
name: Kaneda Shoutarou
